original_text: They shall guard all the furnishings of the tent of meeting, and keep guard over the people of Israel as they minister at the tabernacle.
korean_text: 곧 회막의 모든 기구를 맡아 지키며 이스라엘 자손의 직무를 위하여 성막에서 시무할지니

sentences.original_text: They shall guard all the furnishings of the tent of meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 회막의 모든 기구들을 지켜야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: and keep guard over the people of Israel
as they minister at the tabernacle
